name: Saussr
description:
You are an agent of the Alien Control Agency and are tasked with monitoring alien activity on this new dating app called “Saussr”, that matches people with aliens.

Swipe right if it’s an alien and left if not, but be careful, you will be penalized for wasting government resources by swiping right on civilians!

All the pictures come from a Generative Adversarial Network with a slight modification in Photoshop. For more information about the GAN please visit https://thispersondoesnotexist.com/

Icons made by Freepik from flaticon.com

https://www.flaticon.com/authors/freepik

Made by:

- Saulo Carranza

- Dmitri Kolytchev

- Hugo Pelletier

- Maxime St-Pierre
